title: Having issues recieving the alert when que pops while in lobby
body: I have longtime had an issue receiving notification that the que has been started while in lobby. This occurs about 50% of the time. How do I fix this problem as it is rather annoying?

replies.body: This may be a connection problem.  When you join the queue, the server needs to place everyone into the same group but a network issue can cause you to fall behind.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection.  It's important to get that resolved because missing queue could place you in an a lower priority queue.  Hope that helps!
